data.quote: Anyone who has ever made anything of importance was disciplined.
data.author: Andrew Hendrixson

data.quote: Don’t spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
data.author: Coco Chanel

data.quote: You can only connect the dots looking backwards.
data.author: Steve Jobs

data.quote: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: If the plan doesn’t work, change the plan, but never the goal.
data.author: Anonymous

data.quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Only the gentle are really strong.
data.author: James Dean

data.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
